name: Remove All Facebook Ads and Sponsors
description:
Removes sponsors and ads from facebook pages (including in the News Feed).

I intend to keep this style up-to-date, and feel free to post any requests for improvements below.
additional_info:
[v2.10 - 2016 August 11] Facebook changed their ad-block methodologies. I've updated to block their new ad-block-blocking changes.
[v2.00 - 11/16/2015] It's been over four years since my previous update, but I'm back. Facebook "Sponsored Posts", be gone.
[v1.75 - 05/19/2011] Fix hiding ads in the sidebar. Also remove ads from the image popups too.
